item.title: Statistics
item.description: Logistic Regression Markdown Tutorial Matematyczna interpretacja modelu Quiz correct answers: d. Hint: Remember, the coefficient in a logistic regression model is the expected increase in the log odds given a one unit increase in the explanatory variable. Survived Fare Fare_log 0 7.2500 2 1 71.2833 4 1 7.9250 2 1 53.1000 4 0 8.0500 2 0 8.
